programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Голенко убивает Катю. Малинин в отчаянии. Бражник не верит в видения Малинина и считает его сообщником убийцы, тем более, что в квартире Кати найдены его отпечатки пальцев. Малинина объявляют в розыск. Он скрывается на даче Кати. Тартаковский тем временем задумывает новое убийство - на этот раз, жертва - Татьяна, девушка, которая его отвергла. Малинин снова это "видит". Он пытается самостоятельно найти Голенко, через Васильченко, адрес которого он "подсмотрел", когда Голенко с ним встречался. Но Васильченко подозревает в Малинине полицейского. Он бьет его по голове, приковывает наручниками к батарее и сбегает. Голенко, который в этот момент, уже готов убить Татьяну, неожиданно теряет сознание. Тартаковский озабочен, что произошло с его марионеткой? Малинин удается выбраться из квартиры Васильченко. Он приходит к Николаевой и все ей рассказывает.

programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Спецслужбы проводят взрывные работы на участке, где зафиксированы магнитные аномалии. Совершенно случайно в зоне взрыва оказываются три человека: преступник Владимир Голенко, фотохудожник Олег Малинин и неудачливый писатель Венедикт Тартаковский. В результате взрыва между этими людьми возникает странная связь – фотограф Малинин может читать мысли преступника Голенко, и даже видеть окружающий мир его глазами, а писатель Тартаковский может полностью управлять действиями Голенко и при этом общаться с Малининым на расстоянии. Тартаковский, получив в свое полное распоряжение преступника Голенко, решает его руками отомстить всем, кто мешал ему в жизни. Город захлестывает череда кровавых преступлений...

programme.desc: Спецслужбы проводят взрывные работы на участке, где зафиксированы магнитные аномалии. Совершенно случайно в зоне взрыва оказываются три человека: преступник Владимир Голенко, фотохудожник Олег Малинин и неудачливый писатель Венедикт Тартаковский. В результате взрыва между этими людьми возникает странная связь – фотограф Малинин может читать мысли преступника Голенко, и даже видеть окружающий мир его глазами, а писатель Тартаковский может полностью управлять действиями Голенко и при этом общаться с Малининым на расстоянии. Тартаковский, получив в свое полное распоряжение преступника Голенко, решает его руками отомстить всем, кто мешал ему в жизни. Город захлестывает череда кровавых преступлений...

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: Демоны
programme.desc: В конце прошлого века Дмитрий Назаров, носящий кличку "Демон" был лидером преступной группировки. Прошли годы, и уже в новом веке Демон возглавил вполне легальный бизнес. Но не всем так повезло, как Демону. Кому-то прошедшие годы пришлось провести в тюрьме, как, например, бывшему его подельнику Ацамазу Тагурову. И вот Демон узнает, что через 16 лет вышел на свободу Ацамаз. Проблема в том, что группа Демона в 1994 году взяла в одном банке кредит, который не вернула. И вот Ацамаз утверждает, что выкупил долю Демона и имеет подтверждающие это бумаги. Он хочет получить 2 миллиона. Возвращение Ацамаза встревожило Демона, и на другой день на обычную утреннюю пробежку он прихватил с собой пистолет. И оказался прав, опередив человека, переодетого бомжем, готового выстрелить в него из пистолета с глушителем. Демон понимает, что за Ацамазом стоит кто-то очень серьёзный, и два миллиона - это только предлог. Эти люди хотят отобрать у Демона всё! А это значит, придется вновь собрать "под ружьё" старую боевую команду...

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Криминалисты Макаров, Ройзман и Ким выезжают "на тело". Макаров – новый нач.лаборатории ЭКЦ. На месте он знакомится со следователем Богданой Ковальской и операми Щегловым (Демоном) и Киценко. Версии Богданы и Макарова расходятся, но уступать ни один из них не хочет. Богдана встречается с судебным прокурором Игорем Карпенко, но он женат и трепещет перед своей женой Аллой, хотя и постоянно обещает Богдане развестись. Алла подозревает мужа в измене, но доказательств у нее нет. Подруга Богданы – Вера – с интересом относится к появлению Макарова. Как оказалось, Макарова на должность "продвинул" его бывший коллега и друг – полковник Туманов. У Макарова происходят столкновения с Богданой на профессиональной почве. Месяц назад убили сестру-близнеца Макарова – Иру. Убийцу не нашли, дело закрыли. Макаров собирается сам продолжить расследование, используя допуск к делу, который у него теперь есть.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Макаров приходит к приятелю – Виктору Берштадскому, с которым они дружат с детства. У него своя частная лаборатория "Спектр". Богдана опять забывает забрать дочку Яну из танцевального кружка. С Макаровым она по-прежнему в контрах, однако вынуждена признать, что спец он отличный. В жизни Игоря Карпенко намечается карьерный рост. У Киценко появляется подружка – аспирантка-филолог. В кабинете у Богданы Макаров знакомится с ее дочкой – Яной. Продолжая расследовать убийство сестры Ирины, Макаров вспоминает свой последний разговор с ней. Она рассказала ему, что у нее на операционном столе умер пациент. Макаров выясняет имя погибшего – Илья Кошевой. Богдана признается Карпенко, что устала от их отношений. Ей нужен муж, а Яне – отец. Вечером Макаров встречается в баре с Берштадским. Он уверен, что сестру убили преднамеренно. Подняв дело об убийстве сестры, он увидел, что на щеке у мертвой Иры был след в виде змейки. На снимках, найденных в Интернете, на пальце у жены Ильи Кошевого, Инги, Макаров замечает тяжелое кольцо в виде змейки.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: В лабораторию приходит новый сотрудник – Олеся Бильчак. Макаров недоволен тем, что полковник Туманов прислал к нему столь юную и неопытную сотрудницу. Но Леся – любимая племянница Туманова. Между Лесей и Щегловым возникает симпатия. Ким, Ройзман и Смирнитский разыгрывают Лесю, заперев ее в комнате с трупами и выключив свет. Однако она показывает себя молодцом. Макаров по-прежнему ведет себя с Богданой заносчиво и самоуверенно. Карпенко привозит Богдану в ресторан на окраине города. Но там они натыкаются на подругу Аллы. Чтобы она не заметила их, они сбегают из ресторана, так и не поужинав. Игорь бросает Богдану одну. Богдана рассказывает Вере о том, как Карпенко "кинул" ее в ресторане. Вера советует Богдане, наконец, решиться и бросить Карпенко. Стас Ким выясняет, что Инга Кошевая – кинолог. Макаров едет в клуб кинологов, знакомится с Ингой. Он видит у нее на пальце кольцо со змейкой, приглашает ее попить кофе. А затем незаметно крадет ее стаканчик, чтобы впоследствии снять с него отпечатки пальцев. Это воровство замечает приятель Инги – Олег.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Карпенко приходит к Богдане с букетом цветов и с извинениями. Он кается. Богдана старается "поставить вопрос ребром", но Карпенко заговаривает ей зубы. Леся просит у Макарова, чтобы он доверил ей настоящую работу. Он предлагает ей еще раз тщательно осмотреть труп потерпевшей. Леся осматривает тело жертвы и обнаруживает улику, которую при осмотре упустил криминалист Ройзман. Макаров устраивает Ройзману за это взбучку. Ким заступается за коллегу. В расследовании очередного дела Макаров снова обращается к Берштадскому и рассказывает ему о Инге Кошевой, ее кольце со змейкой и что ее отпечатки пальцев совпадают с отпечатками, найденными на входной двери в квартире Иры. Богдана случайно застает Макарова за разговором с какой-то старушкой, которая просит, чтобы ее "невинно арестованного" внука-инвалида отпустили. Макаров соглашается. Богдана меняет свое мнение о Макарове. Щеглов видит, как Лесю увозит с работы молодой парень-байкер. Киценко начинает его подкалывать. Кинолог Олег рассказывает Инге Кошевой, что выяснил, кто такой Андрей Макаров. Инга обдумывает эту информацию и заявляет Олегу, что намерена нанести Макарову "упреждающий удар".

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Демоны
programme.desc: В конце прошлого века Дмитрий Назаров, носящий кличку "Демон" был лидером преступной группировки. Прошли годы, и уже в новом веке Демон возглавил вполне легальный бизнес. Но не всем так повезло, как Демону. Кому-то прошедшие годы пришлось провести в тюрьме, как, например, бывшему его подельнику Ацамазу Тагурову. И вот Демон узнает, что через 16 лет вышел на свободу Ацамаз. Проблема в том, что группа Демона в 1994 году взяла в одном банке кредит, который не вернула. И вот Ацамаз утверждает, что выкупил долю Демона и имеет подтверждающие это бумаги. Он хочет получить 2 миллиона. Возвращение Ацамаза встревожило Демона, и на другой день на обычную утреннюю пробежку он прихватил с собой пистолет. И оказался прав, опередив человека, переодетого бомжем, готового выстрелить в него из пистолета с глушителем. Демон понимает, что за Ацамазом стоит кто-то очень серьёзный, и два миллиона - это только предлог. Эти люди хотят отобрать у Демона всё! А это значит, придется вновь собрать "под ружьё" старую боевую команду...

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов назначен начальником лаборатории. Он пытается сблизиться с Анной, но она вновь его отталкивает. Она не знает, что Лёшка попал под влияние только что вышедшего из тюрьмы преступника по фамилии Голубев. Тем временем в карьере найден труп молодого мужчины. Крылов сразу же выдвигает неожиданную версию – перед смертью с жертвой кто-то играл в догонялки…

programme.desc: В лабораторию приходит новый сотрудник – Олеся Бильчак. Макаров недоволен тем, что полковник Туманов прислал к нему столь юную и неопытную сотрудницу. Чтобы она не заметила их, они сбегают из ресторана, так и не поужинав. Игорь бросает Богдану одну. Богдана рассказывает Вере о том, как Карпенко "кинул" ее в ресторане. Вера советует Богдане, наконец, решиться и бросить Карпенко. Стас Ким выясняет, что Инга Кошевая – кинолог. Макаров едет в клуб кинологов, знакомится с Ингой. Это воровство замечает приятель Инги – Олег.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Карпенко приходит к Богдане с букетом цветов и с извинениями. Он кается. Богдана старается "поставить вопрос ребром", но Карпенко заговаривает ей зубы. К Макарову приезжает Инга Кошевая. Она признается, что была у Иры и дала ей пощечину, но потом ушла. В доказательство того, что она не убивала Иру, Инга предъявляет Макарову запись на мобильнике.

programme.desc: Богдана и Макаров общаются у кофе-автомата, обсуждая детали дела. К ним подходит Вера. Она начинает флиртовать с Макаровым. Он шутки ради говорит, что вечером позвонит ей. programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: After tasting Masamis gourmet, double-truffle mac-n-cheese at lunch, Gumball decides to do whatever it takes to get a full serving of the delicious meal.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society... / Gumball and Darwin want to see the scariest film of the year. / Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too many times on their alarm clock and miss the school-bus. / Things keep going missing in the house so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. / Gumball refuses to get out of bed because he is in a lousy mood. / Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket.

programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny amazing sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin asks Gumball to teach him how to skate Gumball makes sure that he covers every aspect of the skating lifestyle - from wearing the right gear using the right terms and choosing the right board. But when Darwin finally gets his wheels rolling he realises there might be one important aspect of skating that Gumball hasnt taught him...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny spruce themselves up and head out to a piano concerto in the royal concert hall. Theyre on their best behavior, until they spot a fellow culture vulture who also happens to be small, orange and squishy. Honestly, theyre letting all sorts of rabble into these places these days. The Docs decide that a sleeping potion might be a quick and quiet way of capturing Lamput. Naturally things get out of hand, and when the entire audience catches a whiff of the snoozy brew, we find out exactly how hard it is to stay awake during a classical music recital. One star.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana sets the crew on a quest to the Lost Isle of Giants using a living compass to navigate, but when the worm inside goes missing the Mighty Windbreaker becomes lost in the Mist of Mistrust. Lana and Bo launch an investigation to find the worm, but as the mist thickens, so does Lanas paranoia that everyone is guilty.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When the crew grow tired of Dr. Chopovs snerk soup, they stop to stock up on croconuts, but Lana gets enticed by a plant that promises to taste like all your birthdays, only for Boreas to have a very strange reaction to it.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: In this two-part winter episode, Buster is a lucky bunny…until he isnt. When his luck runs out, it puts Acme Loo at risk of closing. With pirates, danger, and lots of snow, the toons embark on a wild adventure to save their beloved school.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: In this two-part winter episode, Buster is a lucky bunny…until he isnt. When his luck runs out, it puts Acme Loo at risk of closing. With pirates, danger, and lots of snow, the toons embark on a wild adventure to save their beloved school.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: Buster, Plucky, and Hamton join an exclusive secret society but soon realize that the perks promised arent worth the sacrifices. Meanwhile, Babs and Sweetie start their own public society that becomes a big hit on campus.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: Sweetie competes in a cat vs. bird competition but faces pressure to win at all costs. Hamton and Babs go into soccer mom-mode cheering her on, while Plucky, at the Loo Bru, takes over Dizzys shift to prove hes more selfless than Buster.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: Buster, Plucky, and Hamton take an aptiTOON test that yields some surprising career prospects. Meanwhile, Babs and Sweeties relaxing dorm-cation is interrupted by a mysterious smell, and they cant rest until they find the source.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: In this two-part episode, Sweetie and Busters plan to give their friends a non-scary Halloween goes awry. With a creepy farmhouse and ghosts galore, the toons must work together to face their fears…and a villain they didnt see coming.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When Lana abandons the crew mid-quest to go on a personal quest to complete her collection of Flap Shack collectibles, Lana finds herself at the centre of a deadly trap while the crew of the Mighty Windbreaker struggle without her during an active volcano evacuation.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When Lana is left tongue-tied after verbally sparring with her fellow questers, she goes to Chopov to learn the epic art of roasting in an effort to be cool, only to insult half the Guild, and even her own crew.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin see an advert for the latest, cutting-edge Bobert operating system and excitedly talk Bobert into downloading it. At first it seems like a massive improvement, but the many flaws in the new operating system become increasingly apparent. After the upgraded Bobert malfunctions one too many times, the kids decide to reinstall his old operating system. But will they be able to downgrade from the upgrade and get their old friend back?

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: Babs and Buster attend a twin convention but are soon ostracized for not being exactly the same. Hamton accidentally becomes famous, and Plucky steps up as his manager. And Sweetie wont let anything stop her from finishing her board game.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is on a crucial quest to transport an ice sculpture of Admiral Lovejoy to a celebration for her in Weymouth, when the figurehead of the Mighty Windbreaker breaks off and is lost at sea. Unfortunately for Lana, this triggers Andar and the crews superstitious phobia of sailing without a figurehead, putting Lanas quest and the Mighty Windbreaker in great peril.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: On her 12th birthday, Lana looks forward to embarking on a life of adventure with her legendary father, only for Andar to hang up his war-hammer and retire to spend more time with her on sleepy Shediac. Undeterred, Lana follows her dream to join the Guild on his ship, finding odd allies and antagonists along the way, including her own dad.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: The toons take Marvin the Martians class, and head to space. Buster tries to cheer up a homesick Babs, Plucky searches for a space outfit, and Sweetie is too obsessed with a video game to notice any of it - even when the aliens attack!

programme.desc: Darwin wants to get back a love letter he wrote to Carrie before she sees it.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin use Mollys time-halting power (because shes so boring) to avoid an after school beatdown by Tina.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High. / Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. However theyre not the only ones. / Gumball sets out to prove to Pennys father that hes good enough for his daughter. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Grandpa Louie gives them a cheque, the Watterson kids argue over how to spend the money. / When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy. / An impromptu hug with a stranger at school leaves Gumball in an increasingly awkward social situation. / Mom and the kids depart for their hard days work leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mom has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and the jewel thief have a lot in common. They are both round and blue. Also they both like accelerating into blind corners. A full-speed collision results in an accidental identity mixup - suddenly the thief finds himself with a real job at the Lab, and poor old Specs is being used as bedding by a hulking prison inmate. When Lamput decides to open up a can of kick-butt, the thief starts to wonder if a life of crime might be safer after all. Specs has no doubt at all where hed prefer to be. Lamput unveils a surprising skill at the kung-fu nerve-pinch. Specs is busted out of the clink, and returns to the life he loves: sprinting alongside his best bud Skinny, constantly failing to catch ol Lamput.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons discover a family of cartoon copycats who mimic their every move. / Grandpa Louie has a new online friend - the only problem is she isnt real. / The kids find out that Richard has been being picked on by the same person since high school. / Gumball and Darwin decide to use online reviews to wrangle free stuff. / A mysterious package shows up at the Wattersons house and they do their best to avoid opening it. / Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid. / Gumballs smart answers arent the correct ones and hes forced to go back to kindergarten. / Gumball and Darwin discover the real reason Dads diet wasnt working. / Gumball discovers that Rob his old nemesis is neme-seeing someone else now.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Nicole wants a new family portrait where everyones entire face is in the photo and theyre all smiling.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: The Wattersons must get Anais to Daisyland before the park closes for good.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: After tasting Masamis gourmet, double-truffle mac-n-cheese at lunch, Gumball decides to do whatever it takes to get a full serving of the delicious meal.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball wants to take down Miss Simian after she punishes him for not respecting his school-provided calculator.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput escapes from the Lab, the Boss gives the job of orange-blob-retrieval to Doc Specs and Doc Skinny, who turn out to really suck at orange-blob-retrieval. Lamput gives them the slip again and again, and, true to form, the Docs decide to blame their tools. They convince the Boss to let them use more and more expensive vehicles, using an age-old corporate strategy commonly referred to as "diminishing returns". For scientists, these dudes sure are slow learners.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: After a month of questing, Lana looks forward to a Guild VIP Pass. But upon their return to the Guild, she discovers that she failed to fully declare their heroics. With no completed missions, Admiral Lovejoy is about to expel the crew unless Lana can race against the clock to complete a quest, which Horatius connives to sabotage.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana bakes her first-ever Scooterberry cake as an offering to placate a hangry whirlpool, only to have it devoured by Sprog thanks to an oversight by Bo. Lana must navigate friendships choppy waters and whip up a replacement cake before the Mighty Windbreaker is lost at sea.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Nicole wants a new family portrait where everyones entire face is in the photo and theyre all smiling.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: The Wattersons must get Anais to Daisyland before the park closes for good.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: After lamenting her many chores on the MWB, Lana inadvertently swaps bodies with her luxury-loving nemesis Horatious Hoffenstance, and gets to live his lavish lifestyle. However, as Horatious discovers the joys of Lanas loyal friends and family, Lana quickly learns that Horatiouss seemingly perfect life on the Golden Goose isnt all its cracked up to be.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is on a crucial quest to transport an ice sculpture of Admiral Lovejoy to a celebration for her in Weymouth, when the figurehead of the Mighty Windbreaker breaks off and is lost at sea. Unfortunately for Lana, this triggers Andar and the crews superstitious phobia of sailing without a figurehead, putting Lanas quest and the Mighty Windbreaker in great peril.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin attempt to make a big impression at the coolest party of the year with the most praise-worthy entrance the world has ever seen.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Anais starts aging prematurely due to the stress and pressure of looking out for the rest of her stupid family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.desc: Darwin wants to get back a love letter he wrote to Carrie before she sees it.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin use Mollys time-halting power (because shes so boring) to avoid an after school beatdown by Tina.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated by her family, Nicole strikes up a friendship with a sympathetic AI. As their relationship intensifies, the AI tries to drive a wedge between Nicole and the other Wattersons.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: With Andars frustration growing after a series of failed quests, Lana hatches a plan to stage a sure-fire victory for the Mighty Windbreaker. Little does she know, her fake mission will inadvertently awaken zombie skeletons, turning her ruse into a dangerous reality.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana sets the crew on a quest to the Lost Isle of Giants using a living compass to navigate, but when the worm inside goes missing the Mighty Windbreaker becomes lost in the Mist of Mistrust. Lana and Bo launch an investigation to find the worm, but as the mist thickens, so does Lanas paranoia that everyone is guilty.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: Babs and Buster attend a twin convention but are soon ostracized for not being exactly the same. Hamton accidentally becomes famous, and Plucky steps up as his manager. And Sweetie wont let anything stop her from finishing her board game.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old their voices start to break. / Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name. / Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin see an advert for the latest, cutting-edge Bobert operating system and excitedly talk Bobert into downloading it. At first it seems like a massive improvement, but the many flaws in the new operating system become increasingly apparent. After the upgraded Bobert malfunctions one too many times, the kids decide to reinstall his old operating system. But will they be able to downgrade from the upgrade and get their old friend back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball receives a scare-email from a freaky ghost and decides to ignore it, despite Darwins advice. / Vice Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster, Chris Morris, to look after for the weekend. / When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. / Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Join our host, Richard Quest, as he takes us on a journey of discovery to some of the most iconic cities on the planet. Richard encounters many of the influential local inhabitants and delves into the heritage and culture of each city to reveal what makes them unique and fascinating. The first series sees Richard travel around the globe to visit Washington D.C. and explore the awesome power that resides in the city; in Panama City, Richard searchess for some of the legendary figures who shaped its identity; the vibrancy of Nairobi excites the imagination while Athens treis to sustain its legacy in the modern world; multi-cultural London reveals its elegant and martial history and the people of Berlin enahnce its attractions; and the exotic and singular atmosphere of Istanbul delights the senses.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: U.S. State of the Union Address
programme.desc: The Speech is addressed to the Congress and the American people. It aims to highlight administration work and its victories, target political enemies and demonstrate the Presidents vision for the whole country.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Weekly public affairs show hosted by an American journalist, political scientist, and author Fareed Zakaria. The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: African Voices: Change makers is a CNN programme that focuses on some of Africas brightest and most brilliant change makers as they engineer innovative solutions or beneficial changes that will positively impact their communities. CNN is a constantly evolving and diversifying channel and African Voices is evidence of this new approach to news, utilising sources from across the globe. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: With little arable land and scarce mineral resources but beautiful beaches and waters, tourism is integral to Cape Verdes economy. While country leaders are hoping this growth will turbocharge a prosperous new chapter for the country, industry leaders are looking at ways to create infrastructure, both on the ground and online, that can ensure a sustainable industry as well. Also: since the late 1970s, Animal Care Services Konsult has been in the business of livestock. Zain Asher sits down with the companys Executive Director, Opeyemi Agbato, to talk about the companys diversification strategy and how the companys grown with the country over the last four-plus decades.

programme.title: CNN Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: Web Summit has become the must-attend conference in Europe for the tech world. For founders, investors, policymakers and startups, it provides a front-row seat for the tech debates that will shape our future. Europe continues to lag behind when it comes to unicorns - while the U.S. has around 800 startups valued at over $1billion, Europe has just over 200 - but that number has been growing with the AI boom, so we sat down with some of those leading lights in the continents tech scene.

programme.title: Connecting Africa
programme.desc: We travel to Egypt to meet one of the continents most influential business leaders, Sir Mohammed Mansour, an Egyptian billionaire whose enterprises span mobility, industry, sports, and culture. We visit several locations across Cairo and include a special walk and talk with Eleni Giokos at the Grand Egyptian Museum, where history, culture and modern business leadership converge, and where Sir Mohamed serves as a trustee.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: In southwestern Zimbabwe, art has been a language for millennia. Scattered across the towering hills are cave paintings dating back over 13,000 years. Today, in the rural villages of the Matobos, another vibrant tradition thrives; house painting. A seasonal tradition has now become an annual competition rewarding the winners of My Beautiful Home, which has not only helped preserve an ancestral tradition and improve local womens livelihoods, but has now inspired spin-outs in the world of modern art, interior design, and fashion.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane speaks with New York Times Magazine columnist David Wallace-Wells about the climate crisis and the actions the Trump administration has taken in 2025 to weaken environmental regulations in America. Then renowned actress Kristin Scott Thomas sits down with Christiane to discuss her directorial debut, "My Mothers Wedding", as well as her extraordinary career. Finally, Walter Isaacson speaks with journalist Beth Macy about her book "Paper Girl", an exploration of how poverty and industrial decline ravaged the community she grew up in in Ohio.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.desc: Tow truck drivers hunt for illegally parked cars in Las Vegas. A driver gambles and accepts payment in casino chips. A tow truck driver is attacked.

programme.title: Sin City Tow
programme.desc: Sparks fly at a strip club when TWs tow interrupts a bachelor party. Jeremy and Elmers tow of an "untouchable" car turns into a heated standoff.

programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: A man checked at Arlanda airport is attempting to smuggle a lot of gold. In a car in Kapellskar, Malin discovers hidden puppies.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Filthy Fortunes
programme.desc: Matt and his team are in the Pacific Northwest to tackle a barn full of military paraphernalia, and a hoard of vintage first generation electronics.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. We take a look at how things work, and focus on some of the most amazing examples of everyday objects including the worlds fastest elevator and the most expensive chocolate money can buy.

programme.title: Border Control Sweden

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers World Tour
programme.desc: Mike and Elvis are going global! This time, the stakes are higher, the deadlines tighter and the motor transformations are more jaw-dropping than ever.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek returns to the shop where he apprenticed as a teenager, and to a 1979 Chevrolet K5 Blazer thats been sitting for over 20 years.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Ed Stafford: First Man Out
programme.desc: Join English daredevil and adventurer Ed Stafford as he pits himself against some of the most experienced and skilful explorers on the planet in challenges to survive under extreme conditions. This action-packed show provides plenty of heart-stopping drama and excitement as Ed tries to be the First Man Out. Follow Ed as he goes toe-to-toe with an ultra-fit ex-marine as they race across Borneos mangrove swamps while trying to avoid encountering any of the swamps crocodiles; or watch as Ed takes on an ex-special forces soldier from South Korea as they navigate the wilderness home of the wolf in Kazakhstan; or join Ed as he battles with Royal Air Force survival instructor John Hudson as they cross the Himalayas while dealing with monsoon rains and lethal bears.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid Brazil
programme.desc: Heavy storms put the survivalists shelter-building talent and intense situational skills to the ultimate test. Leti barely eats or sleeps due to the extreme cold.

The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. We take a look at how things work, and focus on some of the most amazing examples of everyday objects including the worlds fastest elevator and the most expensive chocolate money can buy.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers World Tour
programme.desc: In Sao Paulo, the boys buy a Brazilian designed VW SP2. Its a dream come true for Mike, but the car lacks power and Elvis has to give it some brawn.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek finds a 1928 Ford Model A in a car club in Detroit. Then he calls in an expert to figure out why it sat so long and tries to get it running.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Parkers Trail
programme.desc: Following on from his earlier adventures prospecting for gold in the contiguous 48 states, Gold Rush: Parkers Trail focuses on the further exploits of presenter Parker Schnabel as he attempts to make new discoveries in other areas. With his companion, Rick Ness, Schnabel endeavours to travel the deadly Klondike Trail over the Chilkoot Pass and up the Yukon River to Dawson City tracing the steps of the 1897 Gold Rush prospectors. Other series take Schnabel on a hiking and mining undertaking in Guyana; to Papua New Guinea where they sail, fly, hike and drive to reach their destination; and to Australia, the island nation that experienced several gold rushes from 1851 onwards.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Parkers Trail
programme.desc: Following on from his earlier adventures prospecting for gold in the contiguous 48 states, Gold Rush: Parkers Trail focuses on the further exploits of presenter Parker Schnabel as he attempts to make new discoveries in other areas. With his companion, Rick Ness, Schnabel endeavours to travel the deadly Klondike Trail over the Chilkoot Pass and up the Yukon River to Dawson City tracing the steps of the 1897 Gold Rush prospectors. programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: At Arlanda, a man tries to sneak 30 million in cash abroad. At the border in Skåne, a car full of alcohol gets pulled over.

programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: Customs check for drugs at a party cruise with hundreds of young people. Two young lads seem nervous. Plus, an angry woman sheds her clothes at Arlanda airport.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Gold Rush

programme.title: Dream Journey
programme.desc: February 2017 saw me embark upon a travel expedition through Scotland, Poland, France, Mexico, Belize and, (alas!), back. Not only was it the first time I ventured out to Central America, but also the first time I seriously pushed my bravery boundaries to do a whole lot of things Id never tried before. I defeated my life-long fear of scubadiving and skydiving, (the Carribbean vistas do help! - No danger Id do that again in Aberdeen), I went zip-lining over a Mexican jungle, I tried habanero-packed streetfood, (failed at that miserably), and organic tequila, (managed that better;), I climbed a Maya pyramid in the middle of a Belizean rainforest and fed hibiscus flowers to a very extravagant donkey. Most importantly, however, I got to know some incredible people - from shamans, wanderers and artists to refugees, businesswomen and expat cowboys. And thanks to aaaall of that, I also got to know a little bit more about myself for visiting the most remote corners of our planet reminds you how different and yet how similar we all are. Im looking forward to sharing my incredible experience in 5 exciting episodes of our travel series, which really turned out to be a Dream Journey:) I simply cannot wait for more!

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: The European islands are renowned primarily for their hotel resorts. However, we will show you a completely different face of theirs: forests, beaches, coves, mountains, valleys and rivers. Perhaps you will find places that will take your breath away. Why just lie on the beach when there is so much to see? Put on some good hiking shoes, pull your shoelaces tight, and get to know the entire island like the back of your hand.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: These are the the Moons of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic. Some are just now being seen at the outer rim of our solar system, all are worthy of much more scrutiny.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea. When it sets in the West it reveals to us its many billions of sibling stars populating the night sky. We study our Sun closely, and like a Rosetta stone it can reveal the secrets of all the other stars above.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its been sweetening America for almost 40 years! Now, find out the truth behind how SWEET N LOW actually got its name! And why do we yell SHOTGUN when getting into a car with friends? Then, is it really bad luck to open an umbrella in the house? And, learn the salty truth on how the POTATO CHIP was invented out of ANGER!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its one of the worlds most famous train stations. GRAND CENTRAL TERMINAL. Well take you on a trip to reveal its many fascinating secrets! And if they are cleaned without water, how do clothes get spotless when they are DRY CLEANED?

programme.title: Big Coast
programme.desc: Trolling monster Chinook Salmon with Big Jim Henschke outside Port Hardy, BC!

programme.title: Big Coast
programme.desc: Albacore tuna on WCVI.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Famous Chinese Erhu player Zhao Lei is leaving his stamp on classical Chinese music by experimenting with musical fusion between the East and West. On a sharper note in downtown Shanghai, Yuyintang Livehouse opens its doors to contemporary music lovers. The spiritual home of cutting edge beats in Shanghai, Yuyintang has started the careers of Visual Kei band Lilith and progressive metal rockers Mathlotus, but the modern music scene is still reeling from the Rock n Roll ban of the Cultural Revolution. Join them as they strive to become the rock stars of tomorrow.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
