programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: Science fiction movie. Canadian sci-fi, produced in 2017. A dystopian thriller set in the year 2030 that sees the world in a permanent state of economic recession and facing serious environmental problems as a result of global warming.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: A black police officer gets pushed to the edge after he is profiled and assaulted by the colleagues he worked side by side with, so he decides to get revenge and take his frustrations out on the community that he swore to protect.

programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: Jason Bateman, Kristen Wiig, Ben Affleck and Mila Kunis star in Mike Judges workplace comedy. Joel Reynolds (Bateman) is the founder of a company that produces and bottles flavour extracts. His marital love life has flatlined, but he cant bring himself to cheat on his wife Suzie (Wiig), until his friend Dean (Affleck) convinces him to hire a gigolo to seduce her, thus freeing Joel to also play the field. This will prove to be a worse idea than it sounds. But that will be the least of his worries, as a horrific accident in the bottling plant, a grifting employee (Kunis), an aggressive lawyer (Gene Simmons) and striking workers bring his company to its knees...

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: The police are called to a murder scene and quickly discover that the murderer, the victims son, is holed up in his house with two hostages. Through a series of interviews with both the murderers fiancee and his theatre director the police piece together a picture of a man losing touch with reality.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: The Good Girl
programme.desc: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.Justine is a sullen 30-year-old woman stuck in a dead-end job at the Retail Rodeo department store.In addition to her mind-numbing occupation, Justine also has to contend with her dim-witted husband, Phil, and his partner, Bubba, who work as house painters when they arent smoking pot and staring blankly at the television.Justine sees an opportunity for change, however, when she meets Holden, a fellow Retail Rodeo employee who is even more depressed than herself.The young Holden and Justine soon begin a passionate secret affair, unaware that it may not be so secret after all.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: Bernie Lootz (William H. Macy) is a long-time "cooler" at the Shangri-La casino in Las Vegas: he is paid to bring his black cloud to any table where a gambler is on a roll. But when Bernies luck starts changing for the better--thanks in part to a pretty cocktail waitress--he suddenly loses his cooling talents, incurring the ire of the casino owner in the process.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: A South Central L.A. con artist with rap skills tries to keep bill collectors and his lover, with marriage in mind, at bay by entering a poetry contest staged by a small Irish town. Can his rhyming skills help the town and win him the prize money?

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: David Lowerys crime biopic stars Robert Redford as Forrest Tucker, a real-life bank robber who found himself wanted by police across the United States for a string of prison escapes and robberies. We first meet Tucker in the early 80s. Hes 74 and has been evading police for two years since his last audacious prison break. But hes not taking things easy and laying low. Thats not his bag. This suave old geezer has a somehow enamouring way of walking into a bank, charmingly informing the teller that he has a gun that he doesnt want to use, and walking out with a big old sack of cash. In fact, hes just done exactly that when he meets Jewel (Sissy Spacek), an enchanting farmer who he quickly trusts so much that he decides to reveal to her his true identity. Tucker, alongside spending time on Jewels farm enjoying her more simplistic way of life, embarks on a string of heists. On the case is local detective John Hunt (Casey Affleck), and Tucker soon finds himself torn between the peaceful life hes enjoyed with Jewel and his old criminal ways. Also starring Danny Glover and Tom Waits.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: American drama, produced in 2004. An American, French, German, Italian, Rumanian, and British co-production. The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Uz nažiem
programme.desc: Uzreiz pēc astoņdesmit piektās jubilejas nogalināts detektīvromānu autors un kuplas ģimenes patriarhs Harlans Trombijs. Slepkavības izmeklēšanu uzsāk harizmātiskais un skrupulozais detektīvs Benuā Blanks, kuram acumirklī kļūst skaidrs – slepkavību ir pastrādājis kāds no Trombija plašās ģimenes locekļiem. Bet kurš tieši? Atjautības spēle uz dzīvību un nāvi ir sākusies!

programme.title: Radio pirāti
programme.desc: Pēc patiesiem notikumiem veidota filma par rokenrola dīdžejiem, kuru "pirātu radio" 1960. gados aizrāvis un iedvesmojis britus. Atskaņojot savas desmitgades labāko un dumpīgāko mūziku, saujiņa dīdžeju pārdroši un ļoti komiski turas pretī valdības lēmumam slēgt radio staciju.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Pārgājiens Lahemā nacionālajā parkā.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Uz nažiem
programme.desc: Uzreiz pēc astoņdesmit piektās jubilejas nogalināts detektīvromānu autors un kuplas ģimenes patriarhs Harlans Trombijs. Slepkavības izmeklēšanu uzsāk harizmātiskais un skrupulozais detektīvs Benuā Blanks, kuram acumirklī kļūst skaidrs – slepkavību ir pastrādājis kāds no Trombija plašās ģimenes locekļiem. Bet kurš tieši? Atjautības spēle uz dzīvību un nāvi ir sākusies!

programme.title: Divas Megijas
programme.desc: Lieliski savērpta melnā komēdija, kas aizved skatītājus negaidītā ceļojumā uz šķietami parastu pilsētiņu. Putekļainajā tuksneša pilsētelē, kur nekad nekas nenotiek, policijas priekšniekam pēkšņi jāatrisina divas slepkavības pēc kārtas, kurās nogalinātas sievietes ar vienādu vārdu. Kriminālkomēdijas režisors ir Džons Sleterijs (seriāls "Mad Men"), galvenjās lomās Niks Mohameds (seriāls "Ted Lasso"), Džons Hems (seriāls "Mad Men", "Top Gun: Maveriks") un Tīna Feja ("Māsas", seriāls "30 Rock").

programme.title: Radio pirāti
programme.desc: Pēc patiesiem notikumiem veidota filma par rokenrola dīdžejiem, kuru "pirātu radio" 1960. gados aizrāvis un iedvesmojis britus. Atskaņojot savas desmitgades labāko un dumpīgāko mūziku, saujiņa dīdžeju pārdroši un ļoti komiski turas pretī valdības lēmumam slēgt radio staciju.

programme.title: Uz nažiem
programme.desc: Uzreiz pēc astoņdesmit piektās jubilejas nogalināts detektīvromānu autors un kuplas ģimenes patriarhs Harlans Trombijs. programme.desc: Lieliski savērpta melnā komēdija, kas aizved skatītājus negaidītā ceļojumā uz šķietami parastu pilsētiņu. programme.title: Džons Viks
programme.desc: Džonam Vikam (Kianu Rīvss) pelnītā atpūtā neļauj doties un liek pierādīt savu titulu kā pasaules labākajam slepkavam itāļu noziedznieks Santino DAntonio (Rikardo Skamarsio), kuram Džons ir parādā par savu izglābšanu no bezcerīga stāvokļa. Viks dodas uz Romu, kur mēģina nogalināt Santino konkurentu un māsu Džiannu (Klaudija Džerini). Kad slepkavība neizdodas, Vikam jāstājas pretī visbīstamākajiem pasaules slepkavām. Viņam jāizmanto ikviens kontakts un visas savas nāvējošās prasmes, lai izsekotu un atriebtos cilvēkam, kurš viņu nodeva.

programme.title: Gredzenu pavēlnieks: Gredzena brālība
programme.desc: Džona Ronalda Rūela Tolkīna par kulta literatūru kļuvušo episko romānu triloģijas pirmās daļas ekranizējums. Trīspadsmit Oskara nominācijas, četras balvas! Tas ir stāsts par labā cīņu ar ļauno, par īstu draudzību un upurēšanos. Stāsts, kas tālu pārsniedz iztēles robežas... kas kļuvis par mītu, par leģendu!

programme.title: Patvērums
programme.desc: Kērtiss Laforšs kopā ar sievu Samantu un nedzirdīgo meitiņu Hannu dzīvo nelielā Ohaio pilsētā. Naudas ir maz, turklāt Hannai ir nepieciešama īpaša medicīniskā aprūpe un izglītība. Tomēr par spīti visam Kērtiss un Samanta mīl viens otru, un visi kopā viņi ir laimīga ģimene. Kad Kērtiss redz šausminošus sapņus par katastrofālus plūdus nesošu vētru, viņš nolemj mazināt satraukumu, ceļot patvertni ģimenes mājas pagalmā. Rezultātā sarežģās viņa attiecības ar sievu.

programme.title: Džons Viks
programme.desc: Džonam Vikam (Kianu Rīvss) pelnītā atpūtā neļauj doties un liek pierādīt savu titulu kā pasaules labākajam slepkavam itāļu noziedznieks Santino DAntonio (Rikardo Skamarsio), kuram Džons ir parādā par savu izglābšanu no bezcerīga stāvokļa. Viņam jāizmanto ikviens kontakts un visas savas nāvējošās prasmes, lai izsekotu un atriebtos cilvēkam, kurš viņu nodeva.

programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Džons Viks 3: Parabellum
programme.desc: Profesionālais slepkava Džons Viks ir nogalinājis slepenas starptautiskas slepkavu ģildes biedru un tagad ir spiests bēguļot. Par viņa galvu ir izsolīta 14 miljonu dolāru liela atlīdzība, un viņam pēdas dzen pasaules nežēlīgākie un prasmīgākie slepkavas.

programme.title: Gredzenu pavēlnieks. Divi torņi
programme.desc: Gredzena brālība sašķēlusies trīs grupās. Gredzens ir jānes uz Mordoru, jo visvareno talismanu iespējams iznīcināt tikai šai skarbajā novadā. Divi no hobitiem - gredzena nesējs Frodo un viņa draugs Sems - apmaldās kalnos un uzduras Golumam, dīvainam radījumam, kas savulaik pats nēsājis gredzenu un kura prātiņu sašķobījusi gredzena vara. Golums piesakās pavadīt abus uz Mordoru. Frodo ir ar mieru, bet Sems jaunajam paziņam neuzticas...

programme.title: Viesnīca "Artemīda"
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi risinās tuvā nākotnē kādā nelegālā slimnīcā Losandželosā, kur slepus ārstējas pilsētas nežēlīgākie noziedznieki. Slimnīca, kas slēpjas aiz viesnīcas Artemīda izkārtnes, ir miera osta ļaundariem, taču viss mainās, kad iestādījuma vadītāja Džīna Tomasa atklāj, ka viens no pacientiem patiesībā te atrodas ar mērķi nogalināt otru pacientu.

programme.title: Džons Viks 3: Parabellum
programme.desc: Profesionālais slepkava Džons Viks ir nogalinājis slepenas starptautiskas slepkavu ģildes biedru un tagad ir spiests bēguļot. Par viņa galvu ir izsolīta 14 miljonu dolāru liela atlīdzība, un viņam pēdas dzen pasaules nežēlīgākie un prasmīgākie slepkavas.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Sniegainā Igaunija

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Neatklātie ieraksti
programme.desc: Rozannai jeb Rozai pēc 50 gadiem ir jāpamet psihiatriskā klīnika, ko sieviete sauc par mājām visus šos gadus. Roza atsakās vietu pamest. Kad pie viņas ierodas ārsts Viljams Grīns, viņš uzzina, ka Roza piekopj savādus ikdienas rituālus un ilgus gadus rakstījusi dienasgrāmatu ar kodētiem ierakstiem. Jaunā Roza Otrā pasaules kara laikā ir zaudējusi savu māti un negaidīti iemīlas lidotājā. Tomēr Rozu pašu nolūkojis vietējais priesteris. Savstarpējās attiecības kļūst sarežģītas. Pēc daudziem gadiem slēptā patiesība pamazām atklājas Rozas dienasgrāmatu ierakstos. Galvenās lomas atveidotāja ir Rūnija Mara, amerikāņu aktrise, divu "Oskara" balvu nominante, arī viņas māsa Keita Mara ir aktrise un popularitāti guva ar Zojas lomu politiskajā detektīvseriālā "Kāršu namiņš" kopā ar Kevinu Speisiju un Robinu Raitu. Rūnija Mara atveidojusi lomas tādās filmās kā "Meitene ar pūķa tetovējumu", "Blakusefekts", "Kerola". Īru režisors Džims Šeridans ir veidojis tādas filmas kā "Mana kreisā kāja", "Brāļi", "Bokseris". Karjeras laikā nominēts sešiem "Oskariem" kā labākais režisors un scenārija autors. Lomās: Rūnija Mara, Vanesa Redgreiva, Teo Džeimss, Eidans Tērners, un citi. Rež: Džims Šeridans

programme.title: Maigās jūtas
programme.desc: Galvenās varones Natālijas laimīgā dzīve acumirklī sabrūk - viņas vīrs iet bojā zem automašīnas riteņiem. Lai remdētu sirdssāpes, viņa pilnībā nododas darbam un ātri vien paceļas pa karjeras kāpnēm. Kādu dienu viņas kabinetā ierodas neizteiksmīgs, pieticīgs kolēģis vārdā Markuss, kuram neviens nekad nav pievērsis uzmanību. Iegrimusi domās, neizskaidrojama impulsa pārņemta, Natālija viņu noskūpsta. Kopš šīs dienas divu vientuļu siržu dzīve krasi mainās.

programme.title: Brauciet ar ērgli
programme.desc: Leifam pēc atsvešinātās mātes Hanijas nāves palicis mantojums. Pirms viņš var pārcelties uz viņas gleznaino Josemītu namiņu, puisim jāizpilda viņas sarežģītais un dažreiz apšaubāmais darbu saraksts.

programme.title: Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā
programme.desc: "Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā" ir ieskats notikumos, kas veidoja vienu no pretrunīgākajiem un noslēpumainākajiem amerikāņu rakstniekiem – Dž. D. Selindžeru. Filmas darbība risinās 20. gadsimta vidū Ņujorkā, kad jaunais Selindžers meklē savu vietu dzīvē. Pārciestais frontē 2. Pasaules karā, mīlas dēka ar augstāko aprindu jaunkundzi Ūnu ONīlu un pirmie literārie centieni – šī pieredze ir pamatā viņa pasaulē, iespējams, slavenākajam literārajam meistardarbam "Uz kraujas rudzu laukā". Galvenās lomas atveido jaunais britu aktieris Nikolass Holts un sevi jau pierādījušais ASV kino meistars Kevins Speisijs.

programme.title: Brauciet ar ērgli
programme.desc: Leifam pēc atsvešinātās mātes Hanijas nāves palicis mantojums. Pirms viņš var pārcelties uz viņas gleznaino Josemītu namiņu, puisim jāizpilda viņas sarežģītais un dažreiz apšaubāmais darbu saraksts.

programme.title: Ķīniešu mīkla
programme.desc: Kzavjē dzīve ir sarežģītāka nekā jebkad iepriekš. Viņš ir rakstnieks, dzīvo Parīzē kopā ar savu bērnu māti Vendiju, kura pēc ceļojuma uz Ņujorku paziņo, ka vēlas šķirties, jo satikusi kādu citu. Parīzē dzīvo arī Kzavjē draudzene Izabella, kura ir kopā ar ķīniešu izcelsmes amerikānieti. Sievietes vēlas bērnu un pierunā Kzavjē kļūt par spermas donoru, pirms pašas pārvāksies uz Ņujorku. Kad arī Vendija paziņo, ka kopā ar bērniem pārvāksies uz Ņujorku pie vīrieša, ar kuru nesen iepazinās, Kzavjē saprot, ka viņam nav izvēles - ja visi viņa bērni būs Ņujorkā, arī viņam jādodas turp.

programme.title: Kāzas Meksikā
programme.desc: Elija ar prieku plāno jaunākās māsas Mendijas kāzas, kas notiks Akapulko. Arī pašai viņai ir draugs Aleks, tomēr nav īsti skaidrs, vai viņš ir Elijas dzīves mīlestība, un viņi ar papīru sakārtošanu nesteidzas. Ieradusies Meksikā, Elija ir spiesta satikt savu bijušo draugu Gregu, kurš kāzās ir vedējtēvs. Kad līdz kāzām ir vien pāris dienas, un no jaunā pāra nav ne miņas, Elijai un Gregam jāmelo viesiem un jāizliekas, ka viss ir kārtībā. Kopīgi risinot problēmas, senās jūtas uzliesmo no jauna. Kad kāzās ierodas arī Aleks, Elijai jāpieņem sarežģīts lēmums.

programme.title: Mazā kutināšana
programme.desc: Odeta ir 8 gadus veca meitene, kurai ārkārtīgi patīk dejot un zīmēt. Kļūstot pilngadīgai, Odeta apjauš, ka pret viņu notikusi vardarbība, tādēļ viņa pilnībā nododas dejotājas karjerai, mēģinot tikt galā ar savu pagātni.

programme.title: Ķīniešu mīkla
programme.desc: Kzavjē dzīve ir sarežģītāka nekā jebkad iepriekš. programme.title: Ranch To Table
programme.desc: Elizabeth prepares a special barbecue dinner for her family visiting the ranch. She makes fresh baked herb focaccia with edible flowers and BBQ pork ribs.

programme.title: Holiday Wars
programme.desc: Hosted by Jonathan Bennett, Holiday Wars is a creative game show where three teams of confectionary connoisseurs demonstrate their astonishing talents by crafting mind-boggling, edible displays. With revered pastry chef Shinmin Li serving as the shows judge, the teams must whip up a display worthy of her immaculate standards if they wish to be crowned the winner. Each episode presents new holiday-themed challenges for the teams to complete, as they use their culinary prowess to produce mesmerising, delicious displays.

programme.title: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown
programme.desc: Three bakers compete to win a mammoth $25,000 by creating spectacular gingerbread cakes based on a scene from a famous movie in this scrumptious cooking show. After being given their respective scenes which they must replicate as perfectly as possible, the judges will asses their edible creations and decide who has impressed the most. These delectable showpieces are as extravagant as they are intricate, with the bakers meticulously detailing each aspect of their respective scenes. One baker will be selected to compete in the finale, where they will have a chance of winning the whopping cash prize.

programme.title: Best Bite In Town
programme.desc: Guy Fieri summons Noah Cappe, Joe Sasto and Aarti Sequeira to try Japanese, Jamaican, Cuban, Greek and American favourites in Port St. Lucie, Florida!

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Joanna shares her all-time favourite recipes, including Chicken Cordon Bleu, Gruyère Potato Casserole, and Arugula and Dried Cherry Salad.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Joanna shares her recipes for spinach enchiladas with a side of Mexican rice and charro beans, queso blanco, fresh tomato salsa and churro cookies.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Ranch To Table
programme.desc: Elizabeth bakes a hummingbird breakfast cake to help fuel the cowboy crew. Later, she serves brisket sandwiches out of the tailgate of her pickup truck.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: The search to find the greatest holiday baker begins as eight amateur bakers enter the kitchen, where they show off their family traditions and superb baking skills. To survive the challenges from week to week, they must prove their abilities in front of our tough-love judges: Duff Goldman, Nancy Fuller and Lorraine Pascale. Hosted by Bobby Deen, this baking championship is the sweetest way to celebrate this holiday season.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay: Holiday Throwdown
programme.desc: Its the most competitive time of the year! The Food Network family reunites for more heated holiday throwdowns, with everyone set on taking Bobby Flay down! Familiar faces form their ultimate culinary team to battle Bobby with holiday-inspired dishes.

programme.title: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown
programme.desc: Three bakers compete to win a mammoth $25,000 by creating spectacular gingerbread cakes based on a scene from a famous movie in this scrumptious cooking show. After being given their respective scenes which they must replicate as perfectly as possible, the judges will asses their edible creations and decide who has impressed the most. These delectable showpieces are as extravagant as they are intricate, with the bakers meticulously detailing each aspect of their respective scenes. One baker will be selected to compete in the finale, where they will have a chance of winning the whopping cash prize.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Joanna shares her recipes for spinach enchiladas with a side of Mexican rice and charro beans, queso blanco, fresh tomato salsa and churro cookies.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Nezvēri
programme.desc: No dzimtenes izceļojis franču pāris Spānijas laukos vada organisko saimniecību, taču rodas nesaskaņas ar vietējiem ciemata iedzīvotājiem.

programme.title: Advokāts
programme.desc: Veiksmīgais advokāts ir sasniedzis savas karjeras augstāko punktu un atradis liktenīgo sievieti, ar kuru vēlas drīz precēties. Viņa mierīgo dzīvi iztraucē senas paziņas lūgums. Piekrītot šim piedāvājumam, advokātam nāksies pieņemt lēmumus, kas neatbilst viņa principiem un morāles normām. Viņš vēl nemaz nenojauš, ka, iesaistoties amorālajā narkobiznesā, viņa dzīve izmainīsies līdz nepazīšanai. Filmā piedalās krāšņs aktieru ansamblis - Maikls Fasbenders, Penelope Krusa, Kemerone Diasa, Havjers Bardems un Breds Pits.

programme.title: Sisu
programme.desc: Dziļi Lapzemes savvaļā Aatami Korpi meklē zeltu. Kad viņš sastopas ar nacistu patruļu, sākas elpu aizraujoša un pēc zelta alkstoša vajāšana pa iznīcināto un mīnēto Lapzemes mežonīgo savvaļu.

programme.title: Zudušajās zemēs
programme.desc: Karaliene sūta vareno un bīstamo burvi Greju Alisu uz rēgainajiem Zudušo Zemes mežonīgajiem plašumiem meklēt maģisku spēku, kur burvei un viņas pavadonim, klejotājam Boisam, jāapspēlē un jāpārspēj gan cilvēki, gan dēmoni.

programme.title: Marmelāde
programme.desc: Filma par kādu ieslodzīto, kurš ar savu veiklo kameras biedru dalās paša izdomātā krāšņā, romantiskā bankas aplaupīšanas stāstā un izbēg, apvienojoties ar savas dzīves mīlestību.

programme.title: Līdz uzvaras vārtiem
programme.desc: Bez darba palikušais un alkoholu mīlošais futbola treneris Tomass Rongens dodas uz Amerikāņu Samoa, lai vadītu izlasi un palīdzētu tai sagatavoties Pasaules čempionāta atlases sacensībām. Galvenā problēma – izlase vēl ne reizi nav iesitusi nevienus vārtus un spēles laikā ir uzstādījusi antirekordu futbola vēsturē, 31 reizi vienas spēles laikā bumbu ielaižot savos vārtos. Tomasu sagaida grūts darbs ne tikai ar komandu, bet arī pašam ar sevi.

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Mošķu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kas jauns mošķu pasaulē? Kāzas! Ragana un viņas iemīļotais Renfīlds, grāfa Drakulas sulainis, nolēmuši neslēpt savas jūtas un... salaulāties! Taču nupat sākusies laulību ceremonija tūdaļ pārtrūkst. Viesu acu priekšā mīlētājus nolaupa ar pārcilvēciskām spējām apveltītā mošķu medniece Mila. Šai mazulītei labāk netuvoties. Viņa ir ātrāka par vēju un apgādāta ar vismodernākajām tehnoloģijām - tās ieraugot, pat Džeimss Bonds viņu apskaustu.

programme.title: Minioni
programme.desc: Minjoni, kas attīstījās no dzelteniem vienšūnas organismiem, dzīvo uz Zemes kopš aizvēsturiskiem laikiem. Viņu dzīves jēga ir kalpošana, taču mazie radījumi nemitīgi atrod sev nekam nederīgus saimniekus, sākot no dinozaura un beidzot ar Napoleonu. Ja minjoniem nav saimnieka, kuram zemoties, viņi ieslīgst dziļā depresijā. Taču minjonam Kevinam ir plāns – kopā ar draugiem Stjuartu un Bobu viņš dodas meklēt jaunu ļauno saimnieku, kuram sekot. Tā viņi atrod Skārletu Nomušītu, kas ir pasaulē pirmā superļaundare.

programme.title: Zeks un Vovo: Leģendāra leģenda
programme.desc: Iedomu pasaules sirdī, kurā mīt fantastiskas būtnes un bīstami briesmoņi, 13 gadus vecais Zaks dodas meklēt savu dvīņu brāli Kailu, kurš noslēpumaini pazudis.

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Strops satraukti dūc – nupat novākta vasaras medus raža. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai Medus spēlēs? Maijas jaukais satraukums zūd, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju piedalīties spēlēs, pārstāvot savu stropu. Cenzdamās pierādīt stropa karalienei, ko bites spēj, Maija apsola gūt uzvaru Medus spēlēs un glābt stropa medu. Karaliene piekrīt, bet atgādina, ka, vedot komandu cīņā, Maijai vispirms jāiemācās uzklausīt citus. Maija piedalās spēlēs kopā ar labāko draugu Villiju un seno biedru vaboļu komandu. Drīz viņa sastop skaudīgo bitīti Vijolīti no Zumtropoles, kura ar viltu cenšas atņemt Maijas komandai uzvaru. Bitītei nākas piedzīvot viltus rūgtumu, taču negodīgā Vijolīte un viņas komanda arī iekuļas ķibelē.

programme.title: Relikviju mednieki
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par vērienīgākajām dārgumu medībām pasaules vēsturē. Pārsteidzoša Otrā pasaules kara karavīru komanda saņem pavēli izglābt nacistu nozagtos mākslas šedevrus un atgriezt tos īstajiem īpašniekiem. Uzdevums šķita neizpildāms, jo mākslas darbi atradās aiz ienaidnieka līnijas, un Vācijas armijai bija pavēlēts pēc Reiha krišanas iznīcināt absolūti visu. Vai tad muzeju direktori, kuratori un mākslas vēsturnieki, kuri labāk pārzināja Mikelandželo darbus, nevis ieročus, varēja cerēt uz izdošanos?

programme.title: Marija
programme.desc: Marija Kallasa, pasaulē izcilākā operdziedātāja, pavada savas dzīves pēdējās dienas 1970. gadu Parīzē, saskaroties ar savu identitāti.

programme.title: Karstais pārītis: apbruņotas un apburošas
programme.desc: Viņas ir pilnīgi pretstati - FIB aģente Sāra un Bostonas policiste Šenona. Lai atmaskotu un noķertu starptautiskas nozīmes noziedznieku, tieši viņām ir jākļūst par pāriniecēm. Pēc sākotnējām nesaskaņām un neskaitāmiem komiskiem starpgadījumiem Sārai un Šenonai izdodas kļūt par vienotu komandu - apbruņotas ar neparedzamo sieviešu loģiku un spējīgas apburt jebkuru, karstais pārītis kļūst par nāvējošu ieroci noziedzīgajai pasaulei. Galvenajā lomās Melisa Makārtija un Sandra Buloka.

programme.title: Pēdējais elpas vilciens
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par dziļjūras nirējiem, kas cīnās, lai izglābtu savu komandas biedru, iesprostotu desmitiem metru zem okeāna virsmas.

programme.title: Lī
programme.desc: Patiesais stāsts par fotogrāfi Elizabeti "Lī" Milleri, modes modeli, kura kļuva par atzītu kara korespondenti Vogue žurnālam Otrā pasaules kara laikā.

programme.title: Ar ieročiem rokās
programme.desc: Mailzs, pieaudzis vīrietis, kura bērnības sapņi neīstenojās, vada savas dienas, izniekojot laiku pie datora un kaitinot tīmekļa troļļus ar dzēlīgiem komentāriem. Kādu dienu viņš uzzina par tīmekļa sensāciju "Skizm", kas iesaista cilvēkus spēlē uz dzīvību un nāvi. Mailzs sāk kaitināt spēles skatītājus un piesaista vietnes administratoru uzmanību. Viņi ielaužas Mailza mājā, nolaupa vīrieti un piespiež iesaistīties iznīcinošajā spēlē. Mailzam ir uzdevums – nogalināt Niksu, vienu no nežēlīgākajām "Skizm" spēlētājām. Sākas postoša, spraiga un stilīga spēle – kurš izdzīvos?

programme.title: Zeks un Vovo: Leģendāra leģenda
programme.desc: Iedomu pasaules sirdī, kurā mīt fantastiskas būtnes un bīstami briesmoņi, 13 gadus vecais Zaks dodas meklēt savu dvīņu brāli Kailu, kurš noslēpumaini pazudis.

Vai tad muzeju direktori, kuratori un mākslas vēsturnieki, kuri labāk pārzināja Mikelandželo darbus, nevis ieročus, varēja cerēt uz izdošanos?

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Mīluļi apvienojas
programme.desc: Klusā, bet ļoti mūsdienīgā pilsētā Robo notiek kas neredzēts un nedzirdēts. Mērs Frenks ir zaudējis prātu. Viņa plāns neiekļaujas nekādos rāmjos. Tikai paklausieties! Viņam apnikuši cilvēki un dzīvnieki, tāpēc viņš savā prātā perina plānu – visus iedzīvotājus un mājdzīvniekus izdzīt no pilsētas un viņu mājas atdot robotiem! Kad suns bez pajumtes Rodžers uzzina šo jaunumu, viņam visas spalvas saceļas stāvus. Šis Robins Huds daudz laika pavadījis uz ielas, nočiepis dažu labu gardas desas luņķi, lai to atdotu vājākiem dzīvniekiem, un nu jūt, ka mēra plāns pie laba gala nenovedīs. No pilsētas pazudīs dzīvība! Atgriezies no jaukas pastaigas kopā ar daiļo Siāmas kaķenīti Bellu, Rodžers šausmās sastingst. Roboti sagrāvuši viņa vienīgo būdiņu! Mukdams, ko nagi nes, Rodžers piepeši satiek labsirdīgo robotu Bobu, kuram arī mēra nodoms šķiet briesmīgs. Ir jārīkojas! Jāglābjas pašiem un jāglābj citi. Ja nekas netiks darīts, greznā mājdzīvnieku viesnīca būs briesmās. Nenojauzdami nekā ļauna, tajā mitinās daudzi četrkājainie.

programme.title: Naudas cena: Largo Vinča piedzīvojums
programme.desc: Largo Vinčs izmisīgi meklē savu nolaupīto dēlu, saprotot, ka pēdas pie tiem, kas izraisījuši viņa bankrotu, varētu aizvest arī pie Largo dēla.

programme.title: Panda Mēness
programme.desc: Pēc sliktām atzīmēm 12 gadus vecais Tiaņs tiek nosūtīts pie vecmāmiņas uz attāliem Ķīnas kalniem. Tur viņš sadraudzējas ar pandu, kuru nosauc par Mēnesi, un šī draudzība aizsāk neparastu piedzīvojumu, kas izmaina viņa ģimenes dzīvi.

programme.title: Bēbis boss
programme.desc: Tims Templtons ir savu vecāku uzmanības centrā. Un tā tas ir līdz brīdim, kad viņš satiek savu jauno brālīti – jaundzimušo pieguļošā uzvalkā ar uzņēmēja iemaņām. Abi kašķējas kā jau visi brāļi, izmantojot gan pazemojošas izjokošanas, gan tuvcīņas. Tomēr viņi beidz savas domstarpības, kad bēbis boss atklāj savu ģeniālo plāno, kā iegūt atpakaļ uzmanību, kas veltīta viņu galvenajiem konkurentiem kucēniem. Abi savāc pilsētas mazo bērnu bandu un ar šīs dīvainās komandas palīdzību mēģina izjaukt gaidāmo pasākumu mājdzīvniekiem, lai atgūtu mazuļu likumīgo vietu mīlīguma hierarhijā.

programme.title: Krūdi
programme.desc: Aizvēsturiska piedzīvojumu komēdija par pasaules pirmo ģimeni, kura dodas unikālā ceļojumā, kad viņu dzimtā ala tiek iznīcināta. Ceļojot pa elpu aizraujošajām ainavām, Krūdi atklāj pasakainu, jaunu vietu, kur mīt vēl neredzētas būtnes. Viņu pasaules uztvere mainās uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Londonas krišana
programme.desc: Noslēpumainos apstākļos mirst Lielbritānijas premjerministrs, un visiem rietumvalstu līderiem ir jāierodas uz viņa bērēm. Šis pasaulē visstingrāk apsargātais pasākums pārvēršas nāvējošā sazvērestībā ar mērķi noslepkavot pasaules ietekmīgākos līderus un ļaut piepildīties šausmīgai nākotnes vīzijai. Vienīgie, kuriem varētu būt kaut mazākā iespēja to nepieļaut, ir ASV prezidents, ASV slepenā dienesta vadītājs, kas cilvēkos iedveš bijību, un kāds angļu MI-6 dienesta aģents, kas neuzticas pilnīgi nevienam.

programme.title: Vīrs, vārdā Oto
programme.desc: Stāsts par nīgru atraitni, vārdā Oto Andersons, kura vienīgais prieciņš ir ķīvēšanās ar izmisušajiem kaimiņiem un viņu kritizēšana. Kad viņam blakus durvīs ievācas kāda jauna ģimene, asprātīgajā grūtniecē Marisolā viņš sastopas ar līdzvērtīgu pretinieku. Šī satikšanās izvēršas par negaidītu draudzību, kas apvērsīs Oto pasauli kājām gaisā.

programme.title: Modiljāni. Trīs dienas uz neprāta spārniem
programme.desc: Pirmā pasaules kara laikā Parīzē bohēmiskais mākslinieks Modiljāni cenšas izvairīties no bumbām, policistiem, draudzenēm un kritiķiem, pieaugošā izmisumā meklējot mājas savai mākslai.

programme.title: Pats varmācīgākais gads
programme.desc: 1981. gads Ņujorkā. Ambiciozs imigrants cīnās par savu uzņēmumu un ģimeni visbīstamākajā gadā šīs pilsētas vēsturē.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. AS Monaco - Real Madrid
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Hapoel IBI Tel Aviv - Zalgiris Kaunas
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Valencia Basket - Partizan Mozzart Bet Belgrade
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation
programme.desc: Reality TV show presents further steps taken by the families who achieved their dreams and purchased vacation homes. Now their next task is to renovate it and make it look like a true house of their dreams, beautiful, cosy and relaxing. Its quite a tough task requiring much efforts and creativity. Have a look at the show and see for yourself that renovation can be budget friendly and fun.

programme.title: Island Life

programme.desc: A California transplant wants to update her 1930s house in Waco, TX. Chip and Jo transform the home into a stunning cottage that highlights its history.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home: Holiday Extravaganza
programme.desc: David Bromstad and his sisters transform his new house into a Scandinavian holiday wonderland! They share childhood memories and decorating tips and fill the home with gnomes!

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Breaking New Ground
programme.desc: During the renovation of his primary suite, Robert is on a mission to understand where he comes from and how he became the person he is today.

programme.title: Breaking New Ground
programme.desc: As Robert juggles his time between creative and construction challenges, he leans on his friends and learns more about his new community.

programme.title: Boise Boys
programme.desc: American reality series following expert renovators Clint Robertson and Luke Caldwell as they transform houses in Boise, Idaho. The pair of best friends make a formidable team, even if they have completely different personalities and outlooks, and they use their skills and experience to flip houses and make a profit. Through their company, Timber and Love, they aim to promote the use of timber in home renovations. With hugely contrasting styles, they get the job done with a little arguing and a lot of hard work, ensuring these homes look better than ever.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.desc: A man bought his mother a home to thank her for her help, but her charming 1920s property needs an update. Nate and Jeremiah create a show-stopping kitchen.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: The Nate And Jeremiah Home Project
programme.desc: A couple fell for the original charm of a crumbly 1920s Colonial. They need Nate and Jeremiahs help to make it functional for their family.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Lakehouse
programme.desc: Jo finalises the design for a showstopping staircase in the entry as other custom pieces are installed, and Chip works on two big outdoor features.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Lakehouse
programme.desc: To celebrate 10 years of Fixer Upper, Jo plans a big surprise for Chip on reveal day with special guests Tim Tebow and Robert Griffin III.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House

Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Holmes Family Rescue
programme.desc: Sherry challenges Michael and Mike to a competition to determine who is the best at decorating for Christmas. The whole family is pulling out all the stops.

programme.title: Sin City Rehab
programme.desc: Alison delivers an amazing reveal for her first Las Vegas clients and faces new and challenging obstacles as she takes on her next renovation.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: The Dunbar Armoured Depot Heist. An armoured-car depot employee uses his insider knowledge to plan a heist that could net him, and the longtime friends he recruits, more than 18 million dollars in cash.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: The search for the Northwest Passage leads to a historic expedition that sets sail into a labyrinth of ice and is never heard from again. That disappearance sparks a search spanning two centuries. What killed the men of the Franklin Expedition?

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: A blind man who uses bat-like powers of echolocation to navigate his surroundings? A samurai with reflexes faster than a speeding bullet? A man immune to electrocution? These are the strange tales of humans with superhuman powers.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: The Dunbar Armoured Depot Heist. An armoured-car depot employee uses his insider knowledge to plan a heist that could net him, and the longtime friends he recruits, more than 18 million dollars in cash.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There are men in America who must still make their living off the land; hunting and trapping to provide for their families. They are MOUNTAIN MEN. Their very survival is predicated on utilizing ancient skills perfected over hundreds of years. This series features a variety of men from Appalachia to the Rocky Mountains to Alaska and follows them as they race against winter to obtain the sustenance and money needed to make it through the coldest months of the year. Eustace Conway lives deep in the mountains of North Carolina on the "Turtle Bay Reserve." He moved here two decades ago in search of a more "truthful" existence. In the years since, hes built a home, and survived by hunting, fishing and raising animals. Tom Orr lives with his wife on the Yaak River in Montana. He is 100 miles from the nearest town, a place he hasnt ventured to in 10 years. John is a trapper by trade and to prepare for winter, he must earn enough money to obtain the supplies he needs. Marty Meierotto, his wife Dominique and their daughter Noah live in the small Alaskan town of Two Rivers. Every month, Marty pilots his bi-plane, traveling into the bush in search of the wolverine and lynx pelts he needs to make a living. While hes on the Black River, he must hunt moose and caribou to survive in the wilderness. Together, they represent Americas true MOUNTAIN MEN.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.desc: Did a UFO land in Kansas? Are remains found in Japan extraterrestrial? Tony Harris and his team of experts will investigate compelling evidence of alien visitations on earth and come to shocking conclusions.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: When Andy and Paul investigate the site of a controversial 1965 UFO crash in Kecksburg, they discover an entire region of high strangeness—and uncover new evidence that could help solve a 60-year-old mystery.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way.
